name: Kaddu Pie
description: Pumpkin spice and everything nice. A freshly baked yellow pumpkin cake with vanilla and cinnamon
story: This is beyond yummy with its strong and rich creamy and buttery notes one just canâ€™t seem to get enough of.  Yes you may want to eat this candle when you light it !! Tempting, we know; but we suggest you do not do this!  One favorite dessert during fall or anytime of the year !
